## ğŸš€ Introduction

Anchor is a powerful command-line tool designed to streamline the process of setting up Python projects for Docker. It automates several crucial steps in the Dockerization process, making it easier for developers to containerize their Python applications.

## âœ¨ Features

- ğŸ” Scans your code for external file paths
- ğŸ“„ Generates `requirements.txt` from your virtual environment
- ğŸ³ Creates a Dockerfile tailored to your project
- ğŸ—ï¸ Builds the Docker image
- ğŸš€ Provides a suggested `docker run` command with appropriate volume mounts
